channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Under pressure from Trump, Columbia plans its next move with other colleges watching closely
item.description: Confronted with huge cuts to its federal funding, Columbia University’s leaders face a grim decision: They can yield to the Trump administration’s demands over allegations of antisemitism — ceding extraordinary control to the federal government — or they can fight back, potentially risking even more

item.title: ‘It’s not personal': Trump’s deportation efforts find support among South Florida Latinos
A list of the Social Security offices across the US expected to close this year
